1.name: The Sound of Music
1.description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

2.name: Per qualche dollaro in più
2.description: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

3.name: Doctor Zhivago
3.description: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

4.name: Thunderball
4.description: James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

5.name: The Flight of the Phoenix
5.description: After a plane crash in the Sahara, one of the survivors says he's an airplane designer and they can make a flyable plane from the wreckage.

6.name: Repulsion
6.description: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

7.name: The Great Race
7.description: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

8.name: Cat Ballou
8.description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

9.name: Help!
9.description: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

10.name: Crack in the World
10.description: A dying scientist pushes forward his project to tap through to the Earth's magma layer, with results that threaten to destroy the Earth as we know it.

11.name: The Sons of Katie Elder
11.description: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

12.name: Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!
12.description: Three go-go dancers holding a young girl hostage come across a crippled old man living with his two sons in the desert. After learning he's hiding a sum of cash around, the women start scheming on him.

13.name: Kaijû daisensô
13.description: Aliens from Planet X request the use of Godzilla and Rodan to fight off King Ghidorah, but have a better use for the three monsters.

14.name: The Greatest Story Ever Told
14.description: An all-star, large scale epic movie that chronicles the life and ministry of Jesus Christ.

15.name: In Harm's Way
15.description: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

16.name: The Hill
16.description: In a North African military prison during World War II, five new prisoners struggle to survive in the face of brutal punishment and sadistic guards.

17.name: Pierrot le fou
17.description: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

18.name: Darling
18.description: Beautiful, but amoral, model Diana Scott (Julie Christie) sleeps her way to the top of the London fashion scene at the height of the Swinging Sixties.

19.name: Akahige
19.description: In 19th century Japan, a rough tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.

20.name: What's New Pussycat
20.description: A playboy who refuses to give up his hedonistic lifestyle to settle down and marry his true love seeks help from a demented psychoanalyst who is having romantic problems of his own.

21.name: Battle of the Bulge
21.description: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.

22.name: That Darn Cat!
22.description: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an SOS, the FBI assigns a cat-allergic agent to the case.

23.name: The Ipcress File
23.description: In London, a counter espionage Agent deals with his own bureaucracy while investigating the kidnapping and brainwashing of British scientists.

24.name: Once a Thief
24.description: San Francisco ex-con Eddie Pedak wants to go straight but local cop Mike Vido, motivated by a personal vendetta, keeps harassing him while Eddie's brother, Walter, wants Eddie for one last major heist.

25.name: The Cincinnati Kid
25.description: An up-and-coming poker player tries to prove himself in a high-stakes match against a long-time master of the game.

26.name: The Spy Who Came In from the Cold
26.description: British Agent Alec Leamas (Richard Burton) refuses to come in from the Cold War during the 1960s, choosing to face another mission, which may prove to be his final one.

27.name: Alphaville, une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution
27.description: A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.

28.name: Dr. Terror's House of Horrors
28.description: Aboard a British train, mysterious fortune teller Dr. Schreck uses tarot cards to read the futures of five fellow passengers.

29.name: Von Ryan's Express
29.description: An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

30.name: Major Dundee
30.description: In 1864, due to frequent Apache raids from Mexico into the U.S., a Union officer decides to illegally cross the border and destroy the Apache, using a mixed army of Union troops, Confederate POWs, civilian mercenaries, and scouts.

31.name: Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines or How I Flew from London to Paris in 25 hours 11 minutes
31.description: Hoping to push Britain to the forefront of aviation, a London publisher organizes an international air race across the English Channel, but must contend with two entrants vying for his daughter, as well as national rivalries and cheating.

32.name: Bunny Lake Is Missing
32.description: A woman reports that her young daughter is missing, but there seems to be no evidence that she ever existed.

33.name: La decima vittima
33.description: Some people like violence so much, that they decide to create a club in which human hunts are organized - members being alternately hunters, and prey, until they end up dead.

34.name: She
34.description: An Edwardian archaeologist and two companions stumble upon a lost city in East Africa, run by a beautiful queen whose love holds the promise of immortality.

35.name: A Patch of Blue
35.description: A blind, uneducated white girl is befriended by a black man, who becomes determined to help her escape her impoverished and abusive home life by introducing her to the outside world.

36.name: Othello
36.description: A General's marriage is destroyed when a vengeful Lieutenant convinces him that his new wife has been unfaithful.

37.name: Ship of Fools
37.description: A varied group of passengers boarding a ship bound for pre-WWII Germany represents a microcosm of early 1930s society.

38.name: The Heroes of Telemark
38.description: Norwegian resistance tries to stop German efforts to produce an atomic bomb component during World War II.

39.name: How to Murder Your Wife
39.description: A dedicated bachelor drunkenly marries a young woman and immediately lives to regret it.

40.name: Shenandoah
40.description: During the Civil War, a Virginia farmer and his family vow to remain neutral, but one of the sons is captured by Union soldiers, sending the farmer to his rescue.

41.name: Village of the Giants
41.description: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.

42.name: The Loves of a Blonde
42.description: A factory manager in rural Czechoslovakia bargains with the army to send men to the area, to boost the morale of his young female workers, deprived of male company since the local boys have...                See full summary »

43.name: War-Gods of the Deep
43.description: In 1903, in Cornwall, a group of locals discover an underwater city, dating back to 1803, that hides a society of smugglers and aquatic creatures.

44.name: Up Jumped a Swagman
44.description: The adventures of an Australian singer in London.

45.name: The Bedford Incident
45.description: An American destroyer Captain is determined to confront a Soviet submarine caught violating territorial waters. Perhaps too determined.

46.name: The Collector
46.description: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there.

47.name: Beach Blanket Bingo
47.description: In the fourth of the highly successful Frankie and Annette beach party movies, a motorcycle gang led by Eric Von Zipper kidnaps singing star Sugar Kane managed by Bullets, who hires ...                See full summary »

48.name: Viva Maria!
48.description: Somewhere in Central America in 1907: Maria II is the daughter of an Irish terrorist. After her father's death, she meets Maria I, a singer in a circus. She decides to stay with the circus,...                See full summary »

49.name: The Agony and the Ecstasy
49.description: The biographical story of Michelangelo's (Charlton Heston's) troubles while painting the Sistine Chapel at the urging of Pope Julius II (Sir Rex Harrison).

50.name: Morituri
50.description: A war pacifist is blackmailed to pose as an SS officer and to disable the scuttling explosives on freighter carrying rubber cargo to be captured by the Allies.
